name: *Click*
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022. 

Theme: Duality

You don't know how you got here, but you need to get through the doors.

They are locked, so you will need a key.

It is not always possible to see your path when the lights are on, so try jumping on the switches to turn them off (or turn them on.)

When you have the key, press the spacebar to go through the door.

Be careful, turning the lights off can make some things dangerous...

Controls: Arrow keys, WAD, Space
